MWC.GUI.ETOPO

Class Conrec

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.ETOPO.Conrec

  • public abstract class Conrec
extends java.lang.Object
    Conrec a straightforward method of contouring some surface represented a regular triangular mesh. Ported from the C++ code by Nicholas Yue (see above copyright notice). http://astronomy.swin.edu.au/pbourke/projection/conrec/ for full description of code and original C++ source.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bradley White

      contour is a contouring subroutine for rectangularily spaced data It emits calls to a line drawing subroutine supplied by the user which draws a contour map corresponding to real*4data on a randomly spaced rectangular grid.

      • contour

        public void contour(double[][] da,
                    int ilb,
                    int iub,
                    int jlb,
                    int jub,
                    double[] xa,
                    double[] ya,
                    int nc,
                    double[] z,
                    int gridInterval)
        contour is a contouring subroutine for rectangularily spaced data It emits calls to a line drawing subroutine supplied by the user which draws a contour map corresponding to real*4data on a randomly spaced rectangular grid. The coordinates emitted are in the same units given in the x() and y() arrays. Any number of contour levels may be specified but they must be in order of increasing value.
        Parameters:
        da - - matrix of data to contour
        ilb - lower x bound index bounds of data matrix
        iub - upper x point
        jlb - lower y bound
        jub - - upper y bound The following two, one dimensional arrays (x and y) contain the horizontal and vertical coordinates of each sample points.
        xa - - data matrix column coordinates
        ya - - data matrix row coordinates
        nc - - number of contour levels
        z - - contour levels in increasing order.
        gridInterval - - the interval to use between contour calculations

      • drawContour

        public abstract void drawContour(double startX,
                                 double startY,
                                 double endX,
                                 double endY,
                                 double contourLevel,
                                 int contourIndex)
        drawContour - interface for implementing the user supplied method to render the countours. Draws a line between the start and end coordinates.
        Parameters:
        startX - - start coordinate for X
        startY - - start coordinate for Y
        endX - - end coordinate for X
        endY - - end coordinate for Y
        contourLevel - - Contour level for line.
        contourIndex - - index of this contour
